list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: grass and the surface layer of earth held together by its roots.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they walked across the springy turf
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ đi bộ qua sân cỏ mùa xuân

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he spent his money gambling on the turf
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã dành tiền bạc trên sân cỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an area regarded as someone's personal territory; one's home ground.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the team will play Canada on their home turf this summer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đội sẽ chơi Canada trên sân nhà mùa hè này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover (a patch of ground) with turf.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the plot of land has been turfed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cốt truyện của đất đã bị trám nắng
